name: Landfill (Lagoe)
description:
The objective of the game is to score as many points as possible while avoiding that the garbage exceeds the specified limit.

To get rid of the garbage simply click with the mouse cursor on the object you wish to get rid of, and it will be automatically moved to its corresponding bin.

Each bin can only contain up to 10 pieces of garbage, after that, the bin will need to be emptied to be used again.

To empty the bin is to click on it, but be aware: It till take 5 seconds for the bin to be usable again.

Every once in a while, a special power up will appear on the screen that if used it will allow to get rid of some of the garbage, so keep your eyes peeled!
